hadiths.text: Narrated Ali ibn AbuTalib: I said to the Prophet (ﷺ): Your old and astray uncle has died. He said: Go and bury your father, and then do not do anything until you come to me. So I went, buried him and came to him. He ordered me (to take a bath), so I took a bath, and he prayed for me

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلِ يَمُوتُ لَهُ قَرَابَةُ مُشْرِكٍ
chapter.eng-name: If A Man's Idolater Relative Dies
